name.en: Soul of the Supreme Celestial King
name.ja: <ruby>覇<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>魂<rt>たましい</rt></ruby>

text.en: Tribute 1 Spellcaster Pendulum Monster with 2500 original ATK; Fusion Summon 1 "Supreme King Z-ARC" from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials mentioned on it from your hand, Deck, Extra Deck, field, and/or GY, but its effects are negated unless at least 1 each of your "Pendulum Dragon", "Xyz Dragon", "Synchro Dragon", and "Fusion Dragon" monsters are currently banished. You can only activate 1 "Soul of the Supreme Celestial King" per turn.
